subject: Tennis
Sony Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: It was not easy, but Serena Williams reached the fourth round at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., beating Caroline Garcia, 6-4, 4-6, 6-4.
snippet: It was not easy, but Serena Williams reached the fourth round at the Sony Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., beating Caroline Garcia, 6-4, 4-6, 6-4.
